```{r}
key <- readLines("key")
fio.list <- fio.forecast(api.key = key, 
                         latitude = "37.8267", longitude = "-122.423", 
                         for.time = as.integer(Sys.time())-(60*60*6),
                         .opts = list(ssl.verifypeer = FALSE, followlocation=TRUE))

```
